name: FlashStorage_STM32F1
keywords: storage, data, flash, flashstorage, flash-storage, eeprom, emulated-eeprom, emulation, stm32, stm32f1, stm32f1xx, stm32f3, stm32f3xx, ststm32, bluepill, blackpill, stm32f103, stm32f302, stm32f303, stm32f334
description: The FlashStorage_STM32F1 library aims to provide a convenient way to store and retrieve user's data using the non-volatile flash memory of STM32F1/F3. It's using the buffered read and write to minimize the access to Flash. It now supports writing and reading the whole object, not just byte-and-byte. New STM32 core v2.0.0 is supported now.
